did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Archives Organization File Additional records, Section 3: Boxes 45-48

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives

did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.langmaterial: Collection material in English, French, Italian, Spanish, Swedish

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Due to the volume of material in this collection the finding aid has been divided into three sections.

p.extref: Section 1: Boxes 1-22 (box 21 has not been inventoried at this time)

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Archives Organization File Additional records #5956. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
